on reading compounds: 嵩高【スウコウ】lofty (of a mountain), tall
kun reading compounds: 嵩上げ【かさあげ】increase, raising (e.g. embankment, levee), padding or inflation (e.g. of a bill)
水かさ【みずかさ】volume of water (in a river, pond, flood, etc.)
年嵩【としかさ】senior, older, elderly
嵩む【かさむ】to mount up, to pile up, to accumulate, to increase
